note:
Save The Children India (STCI) is a non-profit organization aimed at uplifting the lives of children and women from underprivileged backgrounds. Till date, over 2,00,000 beneficiaries have been impacted in the realms of education, health, anti-human trafficking, livelihood and vocational training.

Save The Children India was established by Mrs. Vipula Kadri in 1988. Its mission is to make India a child-friendly nation through its vast range of initiatives and programs.
